question: As per the Code of Conduct by Election Commission of India for Party in Power, Ministers and other authorities shall not sanction grants/payments out of discretionary funds from what time ?
option1: 24 hours before the commencement of the election
option2: The time elections are announced by the Commission
option3: 36 hours before the commencement of the election
option4: 48 hours before the commencement of the election
answer: The time elections are announced by the Commission
explanation: Ministers and other authorities shall not sanction grants/payments out of discretionary funds from the time elections are announced by the Commission
